feedbackCollection.description: Processes for collecting feedback from the environment and self-analysis.

environmentFeedback.description: Collects feedback from the environment based on the outcomes of decisions and tasks.

selfAnalysisFeedback.description: Generates feedback through self-analysis and evaluation of performance.

feedbackProcessing.description: Processes collected feedback into a format suitable for learning and decision-making.

featureExtraction.description: Identifies and extracts relevant features from preprocessed feedback.

feedbackIntegration.description: Integrates processed feedback into the learning and decision-making processes.

learningIntegration.description: Integrates feedback into the learning process to update knowledge base.

decisionIntegration.description: Integrates feedback into the decision-making process to improve future decisions.
